::Lord Elder::
   
  Elder: There are some personal cloaking devices in the arsenal of The Watchers. They are about 99.9% accurate.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Windlord:

"Any Idea how mask our signatures?"said Windlord

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Lord Elder::
> 
> Elder: They are running the basics of the plan by Perseus.
> 
> xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
> Windlord:
> 
> "Then"said Windlord whose was in silence"IT's time for Rodimus to 
> come and know the plan, also Kup. "
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
> >
> > ::Lord Elder::
> > 
> > Elder: Yes. It really is all about getting to the Ark and re-
> energizing The Matrix. We'll unleash it's power on them if need be. 
> This just might be the distraction we need.
> > 
> > Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:
> > Jotunn: Ture, and with Stormblaze, the Minions will have 
> their hands
> > full. That will be the perfect opportunity to do something else
> > without being distracted, either to stike at them or to make sure 
> they
> > can't strike at us. Any plans on that from the Maxies?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
> > >
> > > ::Lord Elder::
> > > 
> > > Elder rubbed his chin in thought.
> > > 
> > > Elder: I didn't think any combiner groups and gestalt forms
> > existed today. I'm glad to find out otherwise. If we get into it 
> with
> > The Minions... WHEN we get into it with The Minions again we'll
> > probablt take the risk of them being unstable. We'll need 
everything
> > we got.
> > > 
> > > Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:
> > > Dinobot followed and stayed at Elder's side.
> > > 
> > > Jotunn: Please, Milord... I have lost the right to that title. 
> But the
> > > Airtankers are the Iron Skull Lords now. And yes, they are part 
> of my
> > > plan. They are my plan.
> > > 
> > > Motherload: Yeah... Let's just hope everything goes right with 
it.
> > > 
> > > She was visibly depressed but resigned at the same time. They 
all
> > > looked that way.
> > > 
> > > Dinobot: And [grunt] what might be that plan?
> > > 
> > > Jotunn: You might know the Airtankers are combiners; they 
formed 
> up
> > > the Airtank vehicle form at the battle in Relay. They also 
> combine to
> > > form up Stormblaze.
> > > 
> > > Bombtube: [Very uncheerfully] Whoop-dee-doo...
> > > 
> > > Jotunn: Stormblaze was made to be about as powerful as 
Predaking 
> used
> > > to be, perhaps even more.
> > > 
> > > Dinobot: But wasn't Predaking a Decepticon? Aren't you all 
> Predacons
> > now?
> > > 
> > > Motherload: Yeah and yeah. Thing is, Stormblaze is so powerful 
> she's
> > > unstable. We all lose our personality when we merge and we 
don't 
> have
> > > any clue of what we're doing.
> > > 
> > > Jotunn: So this is the main axis of my plan.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> 
wrote:
> > > >
> > > > ::Lord Elder::
> > > > 
> > > > Elder walks up to Jotunn, Grimlock and The AirTankers with the
> > > trooper as Salveo comes over the commlink.
> > > > 
> > > > Elder: I will need to meet with him but after I'm finished in 
a
> > > current meeting with Lord Jotunn. Windlord is still looking for 
> him
> > > though. Patch Windlord through to Perseus.
> > > > 
> > > > Elder pauses the link to address Jotunn.
> > > > 
> > > > Elder: Lord Jotunn. I assume you have a plan...
> > > > 
> > > > Kraftlos <kraftlos@> wrote:
> > > > "Lord Elder, nice to hear some out there. No one seems to
> > > tell us
> > > > anything..." said Salveo with sigh. "Perseus is currently 
busy 
> helping
> > > > out in the medical bay, but if you need to talk to him, I can 
> get
> > > > ahold of him. i suggest we use double-encryped channels or 
meet
> > > > face-to-face. No telling what these unicronian scum might be 
up 
> to."
> > > > 
> > > > On 1/11/08, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
> > > > > ::Lord Elder::
> > > > >
> > > > > Elder is monitering the comm channels and comes to realize 
> that
> > > Salveo is
> > > > > trying to direct all communication and actions through the 
> city
> > > systems.
> > > > > Elder opens a line to Salveo.
> > > > >
> > > > > Elder: This is Lord Elder of The Watchers. I have been 
trying 
> to
> > raise
> > > > > Lord Perseus but i'm sure you can get in touch with him. 
> Status
> > > report:
> > > > > Rodimus Prime and Remus both injured. Rodimus' repairs are 
> being
> > > taken care
> > > > > of in the CR chamber. Remus is being repaired in one as 
well 
> but his
> > > > > problems could be caused by means other then just physical 
> damage.
> > > Actally
> > > > > Rodimus Prime is now Hot Rod. The Minions succeded in their
> > plans and
> > > > > stripped The Matrix of Leadership from Rodimus after he was
> > > defeated by
> > > > > Cyclonus in combat. Kup is currently watching over Hot Rod 
and
> > > Remus in the
> > > > > base med bay. Relay that to Perseus. Also tell him that we 
> have a
> > > plan that
> > > > > I need to discuss with him.
> > > > >
> > > > > ::Kup/Hot Rod::
> > > > >
> > > > > Kup had started to nod off when one of the CR chambers 
> chimed. It's
> > > > > process was finished. With a hiss the door on the chamber 
> opened
> > > and Hot Rod
> > > > > stepped out.
> > > > >
> > > > > The two old friends come face to face.
> > > > >
> > > > > Hot Rod: ..... I... I failed, Kup....
> > > > >
> > > > > Kup: No you didn't, Roddy. You fought Cyclonus with 
> everything you
> > > had.
> > > > > We'll get The Matrix back.
> > > > >
> > > > > Hot Rod: How? The Minions ae too strong. I couldn't beat 
one 
> of
> > > Unicron's
> > > > > heralds with The Matrix. How am I supposed to do it without 
> it?
> > > > >
> > > > > Kup: We'll find a way. Elder has a plan. He and Windlord 
went 
> to
> > > find Lord
> > > > > Perseus and discuss it. The plan is to....
> > > > >
> > > > > Hot Rod: Later, Kup. Where are Nightlight and Elita?
> > > > >
> > > > > Kup: Nightlight is showing Hevn around the city. He made a
> > > comeback while
> > > > > you were fighting Cyclonus. I'm not sure about Elita.
> > > > >
> > > > > Hot Rod opens a comm channel to Nightlight.
> > > > >
> > > > > Hot Rod: Nightlight, this is Rodi... This is Hot Rod. Do you
> > read me?
> > > > >
> > > > > He was met with nothing but static.
> > > > >
> > > > > Hot Rod: Hmm... I wonder whats up with that.
> > > > >
> > > > > He switches the channel to Elita.
> > > > >
> > > > > Hot Rod: Elita, this is your dad. Where are you at, honey?
> > > > >
